nodes.text: Thulpin Defense was a squad of ten stormtroopers assigned to Draenell's Point during the Galactic Civil War. They were each armed with a blaster pistol and two fragmentation grenades, and carried a tripod-mounted repeating blaster. They were held in reserve during the defense of agricultural loading platform XT-21s during the Battle of Bissillirus, and acted as Imperial reinforcements during the engagement.
